abstract: Citigroup said Thursday that it had hired Barry Blake from JPMorgan Chase to head up the bank’s health care mergers and acquisitions department.
snippet: Citigroup said Thursday that it had hired Barry Blake from JPMorgan Chase to head up the bank’s health care mergers and acquisitions department.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said Thursday that it had hired Barry Blake from JPMorgan Chase to head the bank’s health care mergers and acquisitions department, according to an internal memo obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Citigroup Names Head of Health Care M.&A.
